backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summarized descriptions of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with landing and timer routes wrapped in dark mode.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Co: Color selection UI with preset colors and a custom hex picker synced to parent state.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Du: Controls for adjusting focus and break durations with validation and buttons.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Me: Displays daily study sessions and streak, updating every few seconds.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Mu: Toggle for enabling looping background lo-fi music with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Po: Main timer component handling countdown, audio, quotes, metrics, and color-styled UI.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Pr: Renders an SVG circular progress ring with animated stroke and glow effect based on progress and color.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/So: Provides UI controls for toggling ticking sound and displays bell notification info.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/us: Implements full Pomodoro timer logic with state, session switching, countdown, color settings, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudio.ts: Provides play/pause control for an audio element with optional looping and internal state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, storing identity, handling login/logout, and exposing status via context.
Custom hook syncing a state value with localStorage using JSON serialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with theming variables, fonts, background effects, and dark mode definitions.
frontend/src/lib/color.ts: Utility functions for hex-to-RGBA conversion, glow and text-shadow generation, and hex color validation.
frontend/src/lib/quotes.ts: Stores motivational quotes and returns a random one on request.
frontend/src/lib/studyMetrics.ts: Tracks daily study sessions and streaks in localStorage with helpers for incrementing and retrieving metrics.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the main landing page with a header, centered PomodoroTimer, and footer containing social links and attribution.
frontend/src/pages/TimerPage.tsx: Displays the PomodoroTimer with user-controlled streamer mode and background transparency persisted via localStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
